title: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function
body_html:
how can i fix this problem:

RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at c:\new-builder_2\win-wheel\pytorch\aten\src\thcunn\generic/Threshold.cu:34
